statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND department = 'HR';
DELETE FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE position = 'Manager' AND (department = 'IT' OR department = 'Marketing');
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM payroll WHERE employee_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE name = 'Alice' AND phone = '1234567890');
DELETE FROM payroll WHERE payroll_id IN (SELECT payroll_id FROM payroll WHERE bonus > 500 AND salary < 10000);
DELETE FROM employees WHERE emp_position = 'Manager' AND emp_department = 'Sales'
DELETE payroll FROM payroll JOIN employees ON payroll.employee_id = employees.id WHERE employees.department = 'IT';
DELETE FROM time_off WHERE reason = 'Vacation' AND start_date = '2022-12-25';
